document_data.name: Velathalar Muirdraevrel
document_data.mainbody: '''Velathalar Muirdraevrel''' was an [[elf]] warrior in [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.History: In [[1487 DR]], during heavy fighting against [[Sembia]]n mercenaries, Velathalar met again [[Storm Silverhand]], together with [[Arclath Delcastle]] and [[Amarune Whitewave]]. Storm and Velathalar started considering a retreat from the city. Soon after, the mercenaries managed to break the wall, killing most of the defenders.
document_data.Relationship: Velathalar was an acquaintance of Storm Silverhand.
